entry.data:
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS AROUND 60
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 60
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 80
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
